thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Fiserv Reports Q4 Revenue $1.52 Billion

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fiserv Reports Q4 Revenue $1.52 Billion
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Fiserv Inc:
* FISERV REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 REVENUE $1.52 BILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.41 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.50 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* ‍FISERV EXPECTS INTERNAL REVENUE GROWTH OF AT LEAST 4.5 PERCENT FOR 2018​
* ‍EXPECTS ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE IN A RANGE OF $6.05 TO $6.30 FOR 2018​
* QTRLY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.41‍​ * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.38, REVENUE VIEW $1.51 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $5.88 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
